heroSection.title: A Legacy of Success: Over 45 Years of Leadership
heroSection.paragraph: Mechanical & Chemical Supplies Co. Ltd. (MCC) is a premier distributor of electromechanical products in Saudi Arabia and the GCC, with a legacy of excellence spanning over four decades.

one.title: Company Foundation
one.paragraph: Established by Mohammed Y. Al-Hamouri as a key supplier of mechanical and chemical materials in Saudi Arabia.

two.title: Growth Phase
two.paragraph: Rapid expansion during the Kingdom’s economic and industrial boom, contributing to major national projects.

three.title: Kingdom-wide Expansion
three.paragraph: Opened branches in Jeddah, Riyadh, and Al Khobar to strengthen our nationwide presence.

four.title: A Legacy of Leadership
four.paragraph: Over 45 years of delivering trusted solutions to both government and private sector projects.

four.paragraph: We value time, delivering our services within set timelines with both speed and accuracy.

five.title: Collaboration
five.paragraph: We believe mutual respect and open communication are the keys to success. We work as one team, building strong relationships with our clients and partners.

heroSection.title: MCC Privacy Policy
heroSection.paragraph: Mechanical & Chemical Supplies Co. (MCC) is committed to protecting the privacy of our website visitors. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

data.itemTwo: Technical Data: We may collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited, to help us improve the user experience.

sectionTwo.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sectionTwo.description: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

data.itemOne: To Communicate with You: We use your contact details to respond to your inquiries, provide quotations, and share information about our products and services.
data.itemTwo: To Improve Our Services: Technical data helps us understand how visitors use our website, enabling us to enhance its design and content.

sectionThree.title: 3. Information Sharing
sectionThree.description: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for direct marketing purposes. We may only share it with trusted partners to deliver the services you requested, such as processing or shipping your order, while ensuring they adhere to the same privacy standards.

sectionFour.title: 4. Protecting Your Information
sectionFour.description: We take all necessary security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. Your information is stored on secure servers and can only be accessed by authorized personnel.
